pkgmetadata.longdescription: Import Surface Meteorological Data from NOAA Integrated Surface Database (ISD) // Functions to import data from more than 30,000 surface meteorological sites around the world managed by the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA) Integrated Surface Database (ISD, see https://www.ncei.noaa.gov/products/land-based- station/integrated-surface-database).
